snippet.title: Beard Blade 2021 Trailer - OUT NOW!
snippet.description:
Beard Blade is now available!
➡️ https://store.steampowered.com/app/1546940/Beard_Blade/


Beard Blade is a razor-sharp 2D platformer inspired by classic titles from the 16-bit era.

Branson’s adventure begins when a crew of thieves ransack his farm and make off into the night with his livestock. Equipped with nothing but a shapeshifting beard, Branson sets out to reclaim his livelihood from The Smuglins and return home.

http://beardblade.com/​

Developed by Glovebox Games
Music by Steven Melin
Sounds by Matt Creamer, Shannon Mason, Steven Melin

🔔  Subscribe for more Beard Blade updates!

Coming Spring 2021 to PC. Other platforms TBD

💈 For more Beard Blade news, art and more follow us:
Twitter: https://twitter.com/beardbladegame/
Instagram: ​https://instagram.com/beardbladegame/
Tumblr: https://beardbladegame.tumblr.com/
